channel.title: Starting the game
channel.description: This is probably the stupidest question of all time but where is the actual launch application... The only application i can find is the setup application and it just tries to reinstall the game. I honest to god cannot find the launch/run application. Yes it's installed as BMS in steamapps and yes ive downloaded the source 2007 thingy.

item.title: Starting the game
item.dc:creator: Thunderstruck
item.description:
I don’t know if it makes the question less stupid but I have the exact same problem…

Read full topic
